EmailTemplate.description: Sent when an LCF Grant Outcomes Achievement and Payment Claim is rejected
EmailTemplate.name: Outcomes Achievement Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Outcomes Achievement and Payment Claim Form has been rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Form_LCF_Grant_Achievement_1__c.OwnerFullName},
Your outcomes achievement and payment claim form, reference {!Form_LCF_Grant_Achievement_1__c.lcf_grant__c}:{!Form_LCF_Grant_Achievement_1__c.Name}, has been rejected and requires amendment.
Your reviewer will be in contact with you to discuss this.
If you have any further queries, please get back to us at lifechancesfund@biglotteryfund.org.uk with the above reference.
Kind Regards, Centre for Social Impact Bonds
